name: Task Manager Pro
description: A comprehensive task management application with team collaboration features
app_goal: Help teams organize and track project tasks efficiently
main_problem: Difficulty in coordinating tasks across team members and tracking progress
design_preferences: Clean, modern interface with dashboard and kanban board views
additional_requirements: Real-time notifications, file attachments, time tracking

name: Budget Tracker
description: Personal finance application for tracking expenses and managing budgets
app_goal: Enable users to take control of their personal finances
target_user: Individuals looking to manage personal finances
main_problem: Lack of visibility into spending patterns and budget adherence
design_preferences: Minimalist design with charts and graphs for data visualization
additional_requirements: Bank integration, expense categorization, budget alerts

name: Recipe Finder
description: AI-powered recipe recommendation app based on available ingredients
app_goal: Help users discover recipes using ingredients they already have
main_problem: Food waste and difficulty deciding what to cook with available ingredients
design_preferences: Colorful, food-focused design with high-quality images
additional_requirements: Dietary restriction filters, shopping list generation, nutritional info

name: Workout Planner
description: Personalized fitness application with custom workout routines
app_goal: Provide tailored workout plans based on user goals and fitness level
main_problem: Lack of structured workout plans and progress tracking
design_preferences: Energetic, motivational design with progress visualizations
additional_requirements: Video exercise demonstrations, progress photos, social features

name: Study Buddy
description: Collaborative study platform with flashcards and group features
app_goal: Enhance learning through spaced repetition and peer collaboration
main_problem: Ineffective study methods and lack of study accountability
design_preferences: Academic, clean interface with focus on readability
additional_requirements: Spaced repetition algorithm, study groups, progress analytics

name: Local Events
description: Community event discovery and planning application
app_goal: Connect people with local events and activities
main_problem: Difficulty discovering relevant local events and activities
additional_requirements: Event creation, RSVP system, calendar integration

name: Plant Care
description: Smart plant care app with care reminders and plant identification
app_goal: Help users maintain healthy plants through proper care guidance
main_problem: Plant neglect due to forgetting care schedules
design_preferences: Nature-inspired, green color scheme with plant imagery
additional_requirements: Plant identification via camera, care schedules, plant health tracking

name: Language Exchange
description: Platform for connecting language learners with native speakers
app_goal: Facilitate language learning through conversation practice
main_problem: Lack of conversation practice opportunities with native speakers
design_preferences: International, multicultural design with video chat integration
additional_requirements: Video calls, progress tracking, cultural exchange features

name: Habit Tracker
description: Simple but effective habit formation and tracking application
app_goal: Help users build and maintain positive habits
main_problem: Difficulty maintaining consistency in habit formation
design_preferences: Motivational design with streak counters and achievement badges
additional_requirements: Habit streaks, reminders, habit analytics, social accountability

name: Inventory Manager
app_goal: Streamline inventory tracking for small businesses
target_user: Small business owners and store managers
main_problem: Manual inventory tracking leading to stock issues
design_preferences: Professional, business-focused interface with data tables
additional_requirements: Barcode scanning, low stock alerts, supplier management
